data.title: Schools in Snyder, Texas: SEVIS Certified for Student Visa: F Visa, M Visa, J Visa
data.meta_description: Complete list of I-20 Schools(SEVIS SEVP Approved) schools in Snyder, Texas. Only SEVP Approved schools are authorized to issue I-20 through SEVIS for F1 Visa and M1 Visa.
data.text:

Campus: Hub City Aviation Location: Lubbock, TX Approved Date: 12/09/2004 Distance: 76.24 miles Lubbock Independent School District Campus: Lubbock Independent School District Location: Lubbock, TX Approved Date: 05/02/2005 Distance: 76.24 miles Sunset International Bible Institute Campus: Sunset International Bible Institute Location: Lubbock, TX Approved Date: 01/30/2003 Distance: 76.24 miles Midland College Campus: Midland College Location: Midland, TX Approved Date: 11/20/2002 Distance: 91.94 miles Angelo State University Campus: Angelo State University Location: San Angelo, TX Approved Date: 04/14/2005 Distance: 99.16 miles Cornerstone Christian School Campus: Cornerstone Christian School Location: San Angelo, TX Approved Date: 01/10/2006 Distance: 99.16 miles Howard County Junior College District - San Angelo Campus: Howard County Junior College District Location: San Angelo, TX Approved Date: 09/08/2003 Distance: 99.16 miles South Plains College Campus: South Plains College Location: Levelland, TX Approved Date: 02/22/2005 Distance: 99.99 miles

The above table lists the colleges and vocational schools in Snyder, Texas that have been approved by the Student and Exchange Visitor Program (SEVP) in the Student and Exchange Visitor Information System (SEVIS). They are authorized to issue I-20 forms for student visa like F Visa(academic student) and M Visa(vocational student), to students who want to study in colleges or vocational schools at Snyder, Texas.

The colleges and vocational schools are sorted by the direct distance from the center of Snyder, Texas. The distances are not working distance or driving distance, but direct map distance calculated by latitude and longitude.
